entry.tran: 社交场常客;寻欢作乐者
entry.def: A raver is a young person who has a busy social life and goes to a lot of parties, raves, or nightclubs.

means.word_mean: 1. a participant in a rave dancing party
2. someone who rants and raves; speaks in a violent or loud manner
